General.Name: Henan Shijia Photons Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Henan Shijia Photons Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the optical communication industry. The company offers optical chips and devices, indoor optical cables, and cable materials; and optoelectronic devices, PLC splitters, arrayed waveguide grating products, DFB laser chip series, and optical fiber connectors. Its products are used in backbone networks and metropolitan area networks, fiber-to-the-home, data centers, 4G/5G construction, etc. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Hebi, China.

5.Name: Mr. Peng  Zhao
5.Title: Head of Operation & Security Department and Employee Representative Supervisor
